mapper.sql: orderid, vipId, orderscene, ordermeans, ordertype, ordermoney, orderTime, storeid
mapper.insert: insert into gd_order(orderid,vipId, orderscene, ordermeans, ordertype, ordermoney, orderStat, orderTime, storeid, belongStoreNam,userId,priceml,addressId) value (#{orderid},#{vipId},#{orderscene},#{ordermeans},#{ordertype},#{ordermoney},#{orderStat},#{orderTime},#{storeid},#{belongStoreNam},#{userId},#{priceml},#{addressId});
mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(o.orderTime) '2019',o.* FROM `Order`.gd_order o where YEAR(o.orderTime) = YEAR(#{selYear}) and MONTH(o.orderTime) = #{selMonse} and o.storeid = #{storeid}
